Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma pushes for India's recovery
Tim Pringle drops a sitter off a miscued hit
KL Rahul is gone. His PowerPlay woes continue
Ashwin picks two in an over
Axar strikes again... Axar Patel has ended Bas de Leede's stay
Max O'Dowd is gone... The opener hit Shami for a four but has been undone by Axar Patel
Bhuvneshwar Kumar breaks through... Left-handed Vikramjit Singh looked to pull a length ball but missed and the ball struck the bails
Arshdeep Singh didn't get his hattrick and ended up conceding 14 runs off the last over

Post-Match Reflections: India go top of the Group 1 with big win
Two wickets in a single Arshdeep Singh over!
Another half-century for Kohli... and a record too!
Fifty and wicket... Rohit Sharma is gone. He's gone trying to go big and Fred Klaassen has brought a breakthrough here
Rohit's got an India record today... Rohit gets the sixes record
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep didn't make incisions in the PowerPlay but has made up for it at the death
Bhuvneshwar returns and picks his second wicket as Netherlands captain Scott Edwards looks to go big and doesn't get the timing behind his shot
Ashwin has dismissed last game's half-centurion Colin Ackermann and Tom Cooper in the same over to leave the chasing side five down
Max O'Dowd is gone... The opener hit Shami for a four but has been undone by Axar Patel
Netherlands need a big start here
Virat Kohli flicked away a high full toss over deep square leg and Suryakumar flicked the final ball of the innings over fine leg to collect 17 from the last over that pushed India to 179/2
KL Rahul is gone. His PowerPlay woes continue. Since October 2020, he's fallen in the period 13 times in 20 innings against full member nations
